document.full_text: pepsico inc is introducing a "social vending" machine that lets users buy each other drinks remotely, further proof that its decades-old rivalry with coca-cola co is going ever-more high tech.
document.title: pepsico to launch social vending machine
lines_and_colors: pepsico inc is introducing a "social vending" machine that lets users buy each other drinks remotely, further proof that its decades-old rivalry with coca-cola co is going ever-more high tech.
